input.sentences: i recently went to my friend 's wedding .
here is everybody gathered waiting for it to start .
the bride and the groom are walking down the aisle !
here is the reception afterwards | i wish the couple the best !
output.sentences: Recently, I went to the wedding of my friend.
Me and the other guests were gathered together, waiting for the ceremony to start.
It was so touching to see the groom walking his bride down the aisle.
But, it was the most touching to see the both of them exchanging vows.
After the ceremony was other, we celebrated the new couple at the reception.
